dcterms:creator: DLR
dcterms:description: SUMO is an open-source, highly portable microscopic traffic simulation package that can handle large-scale networks and conduct traffic simulation on the mesoscopic scale.
dcterms:title: SUMO (Simulation of Urban Mobility)

dcterms:creator: L. J. LeBlanc
E. K. Morlok
W. P. Pierskalla
dcterms:description: The Sioux Falls Network is a well-known benchmark used in traffic assignment studies, representing a simplified urban road network.
dcterms:title: Sioux Falls Network

dcterms:description: A random network generated for evaluating the algorithm's performance in random unknown cases.
dcterms:title: Random Network

dcterms:creator: B. Bamdad Mehrabani
J. Erdmann
L. Sgambi
M. Snelder
dcterms:description: Conference proceedings detailing a simulation-based dynamic system optimal traffic assignment algorithm for SUMO, focusing on marginal travel time approximation.
dcterms:title: SUMO Conference Proceedings

dcterms:description: Traffic data related to Connected and Autonomous Vehicles (CAVs), focusing on their behavior and interactions in traffic networks.
dcterms:title: Connected and Autonomous Vehicles (CAVs) Traffic Data
